job.title: Software Engineer in Test
job.industry: Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Devices,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ltstronggtltstronggtthe opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtteladoc health is transforming how people access and experience healthcare recognized as the world leader in virtual care we are partnering with over a thousand clients to serve hundreds of thousands soon millions of people living with chronic conditions every day teladoc health offers a whole person virtual care platform that empowers all people everywhere to live their healthiest lives by transforming the healthcare experience from acute and primary care to chronic care mental health and specialty care our team of data scientists aggregate and interpret substantial amounts of health data and information to create actionable personalized and timely health signals for our members this approach delivers better clinical and financial outcomes while creating a different and better healthcare experience for people everywhereltbrgtltbrgtjoin a dynamic team of smart driven engineers who take ownership and arent afraid to ask big questions as we solve intriguing challenges in breakthrough digital healthcare engineering with the best practices and technologies at our disposal we have our eyes set on making a meaningful impact on the lives of millions of people suffering from a variety of health conditionsltbrgtltbrgtif youre an experienced software engineer in test this is your chance to work with a passionate engineering team to solve the hard problems in test automation youll be the primary driver in scaling our test platform keeping it stable and creating a test strategy to cover our evergrowing set of programs collaborating with different product and feature teams to understand their goals feature functionality and data needs will be key to your success working across groups and focusing on the big picture will be your charter youll enhance our existing automation framework evaluate and integrate new tools and develop solutions to augment qa and development testing working closely with software developers and other engineers in small scrum teams youll deliver the highestquality products in a timely and costeffective manner during a time of astronomical growth and product expansionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt measure and improve systemwide stability and performance of automation initiatives ltligtltligt drive the evaluation and adoption of test automation frameworks tools and technologies across the organization ltligtltligt work deeply with engineering and devops to drive efficiency stability and improvement in our continuous integration ci environment ltligtltligt design and implement a strategy for endtoend automation across our complex distributed system including multiple product lines ltligtltligt collaborate across multiple product lines to align test implementation strategies ltligtltligt write specialized testing tools for our software platform as needed ltligtltligt review estimates test plans and automation implementation across the team providing feedback as necessary ltligtltligt mentor automation engineers providing constructive feedback ltligtltligt collaborate with teammates in development test and product management to design and implement test and validation strategies ltligtltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtcandidate profileltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligt bs degree in engineering computer science or a related field in lieu of degree relevant work experience andor trade school is acceptable ltligtltligt experience designing and implementing an automation framework from scratch for a product line ltligtltligt active contributor to relevant opensource software projects in the automation space ltligtltligt deep experience automating and debugging productionlevel microservices architecture ltligtltligt proven experience automating across surfaces including web mobile and backend ltligtltligt deep knowledge of testing styles including bdd tdd and others ltligtltligt expert knowledge of objectoriented programming along with requisite coding and debugging skills ltligtltligt demonstrable experience across multiple programming languages such as python java javascript scala ltligtltligt expertise in software design principles patterns algorithms data structures and multithreading concepts ltligtltligt proven ability to translate both functional and nonfunctional requirements and use cases into working test plans and test cases with automation strategy ltligtltligt experience building highly automated environments using virtual and cloud resources preferably aws ltligtltligt knowledge of continuous integration practices preferably using jenkins hudson or bamboo ltligtltligt experience working in an agile environment ltligtltligt strong verbal and written communication skills ltligtltligt a strong work ethic and an analytical mind ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtimpress us even moreltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt experience with container technologies such as kubernetes and docker ltligtltligt owner of a maintained opensource project in the automation space ltligtltligt published articles blogs etc on testing automation theory or best practices ltligtltulgt ltstronggtltstronggtwhy join teladoc healthltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggta new category in healthcareltstronggt teladoc health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtour work truly mattersltstronggt recognized as the world leader in wholeperson virtual care teladoc health uses proprietary health signals and personalized interactions to drive better health outcomes across the full continuum of care at every stage in a persons health journey ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtmake an impact ltstronggtin more than countries and ranked best in klas for virtual care platforms in teladoc health leverages more than a decade of expertise and datadriven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtfocus on peopleltstronggt teladoc health has been recognized as a top employer by numerous media and professional organizations talented passionate individuals make the difference in this fastmoving collaborative and inspiring environment ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtdiversity and inclusionltstronggt at teladoc health we believe that personal and professional diversity is the key to innovation we hire based solely on your strengths and qualifications and the way in which those strengths can directly contribute to your success in your new position ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtgrowth and innovationltstronggt weve already made healthcare yet remain on the threshold of very big things come grow with us and support our mission to make a tangible difference in the lives of our members ltbrgtltbrgtas an equal opportunity employer we never have and never will discriminate against any job candidate or employee due to age race religion color ethnicity national origin gender gender identityexpression sexual orientation membership in an employee organization medical condition family prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind
